ings of charm were minor enchanted rings that allowed the wearer to bewitch humanoids.
These bands of precious metal were inlaid with tiny glowing gemstones. The wearer of such ring was able to cast the charm person spell once per day. Additionally, the ring enhanced the wearers charisma.
In the , a ring of charm was worn by Dolon Daemba, an envoy from the Legion of the Chimera to the Black Raven Monastery. Dolon, presumably, used the rings magic to sway the Aruma Blanes mind on getting involved with the Legions war against the Ten Towns.
